eu.focusnet.app.model.widgets

Class TableWidgetInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.focusnet.app.model.AbstractInstance
      • eu.focusnet.app.model.widgets.WidgetInstance
        • eu.focusnet.app.model.widgets.TableWidgetInstance

  • public class TableWidgetInstance
extends WidgetInstance
    An instance containing all information pertaining to a Table widget.

      • getTableData

        public java.lang.String[][] getTableData()
        Return the data of the Table as an array of array of Strings. The first dimension contains the rows, the second dimension contains the columns
        Returns:
